alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 22 at 3:48PM AKDT until May 22 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT, DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE ANCHORAGE AREA... * Winds...Southeast 10 to 15 mph. Gusts to 25 mph in south and west Anchorage through tonight. * Timing...Until 11 PM AKDT this evening. Most favorable conditions from late afternoon through early evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 19 percent. * Temperatures...66 to 72. * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
